english.title: Days Became Sweeter
text: And I see my lover in front of me
Beautiful things that, in the past,
never occurred to my mind or dreams1
With you, I'm living what I never experienced before
Turns out I never knew love
until you became by my side2
I loved my life with you
And I'm saying it and not hiding it
My darling, the credit goes to you, in admiring you
I knew how to love and live
I learned that you are not like other people
You were able to reach me fast
With you I am no longer afraid3
And I am content with whatever happens to me4
This is the most time that I feel
And my life that you were not in,
I couldn't find myself in it

arabic.title: اخترت تاذينى
text: ازاي راجل قد كلامة ويرجع فية
انا مش زعلانة منك والله زعلانة عليك
مش هستفيد حاجة لو ألوم عليك
خليك بعيد وانسى ان كنت معاك
انا مش فاهمة ازاي الدنيا دي مليانة ناس
تيجي حياتك بس علشان تاذيك وخلاص
والي بيظلم واحدة معاة وعدة وبعدها راح
مش هيشوف الخير في حياتة ولا هيرتاح﻿

english.title: You Chose to Harm me
text: And you didn't think of how your image would look like when you were leaving
How can a man who is worth his word go back on it
And you evade me when you see me and hide your eyes
I swear I am not sad because of you but for you
You chose to harm me and you became small in my eyes
You should've left me like that, deceived in you
You made me grow hopeful of something, and you turned out to be nothing
I won't gain anything from blaming you1
Stay far away, and forget that I was with you
Don't say anything, and I forgive you
I don't understand how this world is full of people
who come in your life to simply harm you
And he who treats a girl unfairly, promises her something then goes away
Will never experience any good in his life nor will he ever find comfort

arabic.title: انت حياتي
text: يَـــــا حَبِيبَي انَــــــــا قبْلِ مِنَّكْ آهْ
طَبْ أَعَمِلْ إِيهْ دَه مَفِيشْ فِى قَلْبِى
دَه انَا مِنْ غَيْرَكْ وَلَّا حَاجَة
شُوفْ كَامْ سَنَة انْتَ وَانَا عَايِشِينْ حَبَايِبْ

english.title: Inta Hayati
text: oh my beloved ,while i was after you
i used to fear the love and its wounds
and i met your eyes that took me and brought me back
the days of my life that got lost,why there is nothing between us left
but the separation ,wo what shall i do
there is nothing but the yearning in my heart
why do you and refuse to speak to me and avoid
me ,oh my beloved ,it's such a shame;understand me and don't leave me
confused,if i was mistaken then leave me i'm satisfied
and blame me too,but don't you go away and leave me
it's like throwing me in fire
so look at my eyes with your eyes,touch me and get closer
to me,i'm leaving for you all my life
i'm nothing without you ,come back cause it's you that
i need,i'm saying it to you from my heart ,you're my life
look how many years ,you and i have been lovers
i really miss you ,my heart is wounded of distance
i really miss you ,my heart is wounded of distance
as long as your away oh my percious,i miss so many things
my heart is on you,i'm closer to you than you are
my heart is on you,i'm closer to you than you are
so forgive me now,i know you have a big
my beloved ,come come ,i say to you ,there is nothing
why do you and refuse to speak to me and avoid
me ,oh my beloved ,it's such a shame;understand me and don't leave me
confused,if i was mistaken then leave me i'm satisfied
and blame me too,but don't you go away and leave me
it's like throwing me in fire
so look at my eyes with your eyes,touch me and get closer
to me,i'm leaving for you all my life
i'm nothing without you ,come back cause it's you that
i need,i'm saying it to you from my heart ,you're my life
look how many years ,you and i have been lovers

english.title: Yes I love Him
text: Yes I love him and I will be with him
I will spend all my ages with him
What ever what they are say I don't care
I don't let him and I don't forget him
I understand him and I know him
I wish them to let us
He is my love and I loved him
I don't care what are they say
I see my happiness with him
I like his talking even his blame I liked
even if sometimes he is cruel with me
His love is the best life

arabic.title: بقيت بتوحشنى
text: وِبقِيتْ بِتُوَحَشْنِى وَانَا فِى حُضْنَكْ وَانَا ضَمَّاكْ
خَلَاصْ دِلْوَقْتِى وَانَا وِيَاكْ خُضْنِى فِى حُضْنِ هَوَاكْ
نَعِيشْ نَعِيشْ كُلِّ الْلِى فَاتْ نِــــرْجِعَ بِــــالذِّكُرَيَــــاتْ
يَــــارِيتْ تَخَلِّينِى وَانَا وُيَاكْ أَدُوبْ وَاشْتَــاقْ
أَحْضُنِّى دَفِّيـــنِى وْنَسِى قَلْبِــــى أَىْ فُــــــرَاقْ
خَلَاصْ دِلْوَقْتِى وَانَا وِيَاكْ خُضْنِى فِى حُضْنِ هَوَاكْ
نَعِيشْ نَعِيشْ كُلِّ الْلِى فَاتْ نِــــرْجِعَ بِــــالذِّكُرَيَــــاتْ

english.title: I'm Starting to Miss You
text: - I’m starting to miss you…and I miss talking to you
- And I’m starting to miss you…even when I’m embracing/hugging you
- that’s it...right now when I’m with you..embrace me in your love
- I will spend the rest of my life with you
- we will live on and on, live the moments of the past and relive our memories
- …to the first moment I saw you.
-Oh, I wish you would keep me with your … and with you I soften and become passionate
- embrace me, make me feel warm… and make my heart forget any feelings of longing.
- that’s it...right now when I’m with you..embrace me in your love
- I will spend the rest of my life with you
- we will live on and on, live the moments of the past and relive our memories
- …to the first moment I saw you.

arabic.title: جديدة
text: جديدة مع الحب مع انا لسة صغيرة
يا دوب سمعت عنة حكايات متنطورة
والي تقولي صعب والي تقولي حلو
ياعني انا لما احب هيحصل اية يا تارا
ياريت الاقي حد اعيش علشان يحبني
وبكل بصة منة تقولي روحي اطمني
احب قلب يارب يخاف عليا يحسني

english.title: Novice
text: I'm novice in this love thing. I'm quite young
Hardly heard some running stories about it
Some says it is hard, some says it is sweet
What would happen if I felt in love ?
"a hurt woman" "a woman with a (bad) history"
I want to share my life
I want him to be my man and (I want) to satisfy him
I wish I will find whom I will live to be loved by
Whose every single glance says "don't be afraid, go on"
I'm keeping saying "Oh, God! When I'm going to love
let me love (someone whose) heart feels and worries about me"

english.title: My tears, enough!
text: ah ( sound made when someone is upset, here the singer used it as a word for complain) from the broken heart that I have
ah from the love that I lost
ah from the broken heart that I have
I'm full of pain and injustice is Haram ( or forbidden, here comes as 'not allowed' )
I will no longer live like this with tears in my eyes
(metaphorically she is talking with her tears) enough my tears, stop it my tears ( stop shedding tears )
He ( the person that the singer loves ) will shed blood instead of tears
and he will hold depression inside his heart
and he will not that I'm not an easy person
and that this world is not easy either
I will not live weak and low for him
enough my tears, stop it my tears
I will break his heart with my hands
I will see him crying with my own eyes
and he will regret that he lost me
and he will dream again to come back to me
and his eyes will be in shock
torturing and hurting (me), I want to have some rest
and escape from my weakness and my grief
He oppressed me a lot and he hurt me a lot
and he sacrificed my heart and throw me (got rid of me)
enough my tears, enough my tears
I will show his heart the taste of humiliation
I will make him get bored from his own life
I will put inside him hundred barriers ( she will make things more difficult for him)
to be left alone, incapable and low esteemed
in a day he prays easily ( not sure what she means, but I would say that when someone is in bad situation, he/she pray s to higher power /god/ )
enough my tears, enough my tears
and I will take my revenge and more
and I will break his heart with my wings
for you my tears to be in rest
and he will be left broken
torturing and hurting (me), I want to have some rest
and escape from my weakness and my grief
He oppressed me a lot and he hurt me a lot
and he sacrificed my heart and throw me (got rid of me)
ah from the love that is lost (x2)

arabic.title: شوف اد ايه
text: شُوفْ أَدِّ إِيهْ عَدِّتْ لَيَالِى فِـى عُمْرِنَا مِنْ أَدِّ إِيهْ
شُوفْ أَدِّ إِيهْ عَيِشِينْ حَبِيبِي لْــوَحْدِنَا مِنْ أَدِّ إِيهْ
آهْ مِنْ يُومْ إِيدِينَا مُوَدَّعُــوا تَمَن فِرَقْــنَا بْنِدْفَعُــو
آهْ مِنْ يُومْ إِيدِينَا تَمَنْ فِرَقْنَا بْنِدْفَعوا وُجْدِيدْنَا أَيهْ
رُوحِيلُوا يَا أَيَامْ وُقُولِيلُوا يَا أَيَامْ
رُوحِيلُوا يَا أَيَامْ وُقُولِيلُوا يَا أَيَامْ
حَلَالْ دَهْ وَلَّا حرَامْ يِبِقَى حَبِيبِي يَا نَاسْ هِنَا وِنِفْسِى فِيهْ
أَنَـا بَعَدِ مِنُّه يَــاهَوَى أَنَا لِيَّا مِينْ
أَنَـا بَعَدِ مِنُّه يَــاهَوَى أَنَا لِيَّا مِينْ
لُـوْ إِلْبَعَادْ بِيادَيَا أنَــا سَاعَدْنِى لِيا
خَلَّانِى لِيهْ أَضِيَع أنَـا قُدَامَ عَيْنَيَهْ
رُوحِيلُوا يَا أَيَامْ وُقُولِيلُوا يَا أَيَامْ
رُوحِيلُوا يَا أَيَامْ وُقُولِيلُوا يَا أَيَامْ
حَلَالْ دَهْ وَلَّا حرَامْ يِبِقَى حَبِيبِي يَا نَاسْ هِنَا وِنِفْسِى فِيهْ
نَدِرِنْ عَلَيَّــا يَــا هَوَى لُوْ يِجِى يُومْ
لَاجِيبْلُهْ حَتَّهْ مِن السَّمَا وُكُلِّ النُّجُومْ
نَدِرِنْ عَلَيَّــا يَــا هَوَى لُوْ يِجِى يُومْ
لَاجِيبْلُهْ حَتَّهْ مِن السَّمَا وُكُلِّ النُّجُومْ
لُوْ إِلْبَعَادْ ذَنْبَى أنَــا يِسَامَحْنِى فِيـــهْ
وُمِنْ انَّهَارْدَة اكُونْ أَنَـا مِلْكِ لْإِيدِيهْ
رُوحِيلُوا يَا أَيَامْ وُقُولِيلُوا يَا أَيَامْ
حَلَالْ دَهْ وَلَّا حرَامْ يِبِقَى حَبِيبِي يَا نَاسْ هِنَا وُنِفْسِى فِيهْ

english.title: See how many nghts that passed
text: See how many nights passed In our lifetime
See for how long we're living,  darling by ourselves
Oh, since the day our hands didn't wave goodby they paied for our separation
Oh, since the day our hands didn't wave goodby they paied for our separation , what's our new
Go to em oh days and say to em oh days
Is this legal or not my darling stays here, people and I want em
After em oh love whom Is left for me
He's the wound and the cure and all years
If distance Is up to I'd help me
Why he let me get lost In front of his eyes
Go to em and tell em oh days
Go to em and tell em oh days
Is this legal or not , my darling stays here and I want em
I vow to myself oh love If he comes for a day
I would bring It to em even from the sky and all stars
I vow to myself oh love If he comes a day
I would bring It to em even from the sky and all stars
If distance Is my fault I'll forgive me for It
And as of today I belong to his hands
Go to em oh days and say to em oh days
Is this legal or not my darling stays here and I want em

arabic.title: عايزة اعيش
text: لا في وقت فات ولا ذكرايات مفيهاش هموم
قفلة انا على نفسي الف باب
عاوزة الي ظلمني في يوم زمان
لو شافني قابلني في اي مكان يلاقيني عايشة

english.title: I wanna LIVE
text: I wanna get away for a while
live see things and think  anew
and do things that I've never done before
How I wish to run away from so many things
To forget about the one who  start  the story of the road
I wish that I wouldn't do anything that I don't like
as If It was the first day
where there's neither time passed, nor  memories that are free of worries
locking a thousand doors on myself
taking  into account what people say
I want the one who abused me once
If he saw me or met me somewhere , he would find me a live and Indifferent
as If It was the first day

arabic.title: غيرنى جرحى
text: مَــــبَقِتْشَ انَا الْلى دْمُوعَ عنِيــهَا قُرَيِّبَة
مَــفَاضَلْشَ حَاجَة فِيَّا تَعَرَفَها أَلَّا إِسْمِى
ضُيِّعَتِ مِنِّى سْنِينْ كِتِيرْ رَاحَـــتَ هَدَرْ
وُبْظُلْمِ قَلْبَكْ مَاتْ خَلَاصْ وَرَقَ الشَّجَرْ
وَعَــشَانِ يعَيِشْ مِنْ تَانِى عَايِزْ مُعَجِزَة

english.title: my wound had changed me
text: Didn't I tell you that my wounds had changed me
It had changed my feelings Instead of my face expression
I'm not that good Innocent quiet girl anymore
I'm not the one whose tears of her eyes are near
there's nothing left In me you know except for my name
you waste a lot of years of my life they went In vain
and by the Injustice of your heart the trees leaves are completely dead
and In order to live one more time they need a miracle
In an extreme way you managed to fool me
and you fooled my heart with your Innocent words
and I remained stunned by you
It turns out that your heart was a slow killer
Didn't I tell you that my wound

arabic.title: كده كده
text: كِدَه كِدَهْ هَتْجِينِى وِ انْـــــــــتَ عَامِل زَعْلَانْ
وَانَا قَالْ مُضْطُرَّة انَّى اقْصَدَ وُاعَدِّيهَا كَمَـانْ
كِدَه كِدَهْ هَتْجِينِى هَتْجِينِى انْتَ عَامِل زَعْلَانْ
وَانَا قَالْ مُضْطُرَّة انَّى اقْصَدَ وُاعَدِّيهَا كَمَـانْ
إِوُعَى تْفَكَّرْ نَفْسَكْ شَاطِرْ وَلَّا خَلَاصْ جِبتِ مِنْ الأَخِرْ
إِوُعَى تْفَكَّرْ نَفْسَكْ شَاطِرْ وَلَّا خَلَاصْ جِبتِ مِنْ الأَخِرْ
مَــبَلَاشْ حَوَارُتْ تَـمْثِيلْ حَكَايَــاتْ مَــتْفُوقْ يَــا حَبِيبِي
لَا دَه انْتَ صَحِيحَ عَقْلَكْ تَـعْبَانْ
لَوْ قَلْبَى انَا مِنَّكْ كَانْ شَايِلْ
قَلَاقِيكْ بِـتْجِينِى وُتِتْحَايِلْ أَنَــا قَلْبِى أَوَانْ قَلَاقِيكْ صَعَبَانْ
أَنَا عَارِفَة انَّكْ مَجْنُونْ بِيَّا وِبَلَاشْ بَقَى مِن الْحَرَكَاتْ دِيَّا
أَنَا عَارِفَة انَّكْ مَجْنُونْ بِيَّا وِبَلَاشْ بَقَى مِن الْحَرَكَاتْ دِيَّا
إِنْتَ بْتَعْمِلْ نَفْسَكْ نَاصَحْ عَلَــشَانْ مَا انَا بَسْكُتْ وِبَسَامَحْ

english.title: Overall
text: Overall you'll come to me feeling sad
And when I say I have to, I mean It and more too
Overall you'll come to me feeling sad
And when I say I have to, I mean It and more too
Don't you ever think that you're smart
Don't you ever think that you're smart
enough acting dialogues and endless stories, honey
No, It's true that your mind Is tired
I'm also strong and I'm not gonna be weak
I say never mind and react
I'm also strong and I'm not gonna be weak
I say never mind and react
If my heart held a grudge against you
You'll come to me playing tricks on my heart
Or I'll find you feeling sorry
I know that you're mad about me , enough of these tricks
I know that you're mad about me and enough of these tricks now
You're acting like you're an advisor for I shut up and forgive

english.title: I was dying
text: I was dying whenever you were far from me
I was feeling you were part of me
I was faithful, once a time...
I was living just for you
I become week when you're there
I gave you all my tenderness
Never ever I'll miss you again
A heart of which I was healing the wounds
A heart, I was happy when he was
A heart that was tough and selfish
A heart that sold me in a glance
The wounds you make me are still thee
I am healing my wounds by myself

arabic.title: كنت عايش
text: انا كنت عايش بس ليكي ومش بفكر
الي فيكي ضاع معاكي سنين كتير
عايش علشانك وناسي روحي ولا كان في بالي
انك تروحي انتي اية مفيش ضمير
مش هموت من بعد منك متخافيش

english.title: I used to  live
text: I used to live only for you and think only about you and with you I wasted a lot of years of my life
living with you and forgetting myself and I've never had In mind that
you would leave , what are you, unscrupulous
why did you sell my heart for cheap without caring
your love was the reason for me to live
tell me the truth and don't lie
my worldly life taught a lesson that couldn't be forgotten
but I'll get over you and I'll be able to live without you
I won't die ,,,,  don't be afraid
tomorrow It'll be your turn don't worry
the next one will take It away from you don't be sorry

arabic.title: ماشوفتش كده
text: يا كل شئ في الدنيا ليا
وانا وياك بحس انى لاقيت حجات
وخداك في حضني تفضل مدفيني بايديك
ولما تغيب عنى يوم تكتر على
دة  كل شئ في الدنيا ليا

english.title: I've never seen ANYTHING LIKE THIS
text: In my life I have never seen anything like this
l never thought that love could do all this
you're on my mind all the time
I'm living all my life Just for you
I used up all my love on you
where can I get a heart for all that
Oh, you mean the world to me
you're more precious than my soul and my eyes
If I give up my life for you, It wouldn't be enough
I'm not going to tell you what's wrong with me
well you can already tell by the way I look
l love Is Just an ordinary sentence
when I'm with you I feel like I've found the things
that I lost and I wish that I could stay
with your cheecks In my arms and that  you keep warming me up with your hands
when you're away from me , my heart becomes heavy with worries and cares
I spend all the time sleeping
so that I can dream of you baby
this Is everything for me In the whole world
you're more precious than my soul and my eyes
If I give up my life for you , It wouldn't be enough
I'm not gonna tell you what's wrong with me
you can already tell that by the way I look
I love you Is Just an ordinary sentence

arabic.title: من الاخر
text: بسهر وافكر فيك وبفضل صاحيه ومافيش نوم
اروحله يجيلي ويلاغيني واجيب سيرتك معاه
ومليت عليا حياتي نسيتنى كل الناس
احاسيس جديدة عليا مكنش قلبي عارفها
بسهر وافكر كل يوم وبفصل صاحيه ومافيش نوم
اروحله يجيلي ويلاغيني واجيب سيرتك معاه
مليت عليا حياتي نستني كل الناس وانسي يا حبيبي﻿

english.title: Basically
text: Who do you want me to forget, love?
Where did you get these words from?
And if I left you, where would I find someone like you?
Basically, let me tell you something
My love for you is getting bigger
Every second, and it won't stop
I stay up late and never sleep, thinking of you
Even the moon up in the sky
I'd always take pictures of it
I'd go it and it would come to me, and we'd talk about you
I swear by how precious you are to me
That you, my love, are to me
The world and everything in it, and I have no one but you
You're the only one, believe me
In this whole world who captivated me
And filled up my world and made me forget about everyone else
Who do you want me to forget, love?
Put your heart at ease, love
Tell it that you swear you love it
And no matter what happens between us
With you, I see the world
It's hard to explain how beautiful it is
New feelings that my heart had not known
Basically, let me tell you something
My love for you is getting bigger
Every second, and it won't stop
I stay up late and never sleep, thinking of you
Even the moon up in the sky
I'd always take pictures of it
I'd go it and it would come to me, and we'd talk about you
I swear by how precious you are to me
That you, my love, are to me
The world and everything in it, and I have no one but you
You're the only one, believe me
In this whole world who captivated me
And filled up my world and made me forget about everyone else, and forget it, love

arabic.title: من مصلحتي
text: كل الناس منا في ناس مش عاجبني
لو حبيت حاجة اعملها مقولش ياريت
في حياتي مسيري في يوم هوصلة﻿

english.title: It's better for me to
text: It's better for me to stay as I want
And forget about everything that exhausts me
I don't have to please everyone
There's nothing I don't like about them
If I wanted to do something I wouldn't say If only
Cause I would be wrong If I wait
Well I will try , after all I have nothing to lose
As long as I have a goal
In my life,  today I'll go all the way or I'll continue my Journey In a day

arabic.title: هأه
text: انا لا مش الي يتهب فيها
بكده انا مجيش مليش في الكلام دة
ولا انا الشخط دة لية فية

english.title: Ha'a
text: And I'm not the one who swallows her pride and bear him
No I'm the one that whose nervousness
I'll drive him crazy he who picks me up
And I'll show him for real what I'm gonna do
Thus,  I won't come , I have nothing to do with this
Tell him to keep It down
So he doesn't have to play the same note or he has to change his style

arabic.title: هاعيش بقى
text: لَا لَا لَا أَنَا إِيهْ الْلِى جَرَالِى
لَا لَا لَا بَعَدِ مَا قلْهَالِى
لَا لَا لَا وَلَا كَانْ عَلَى بَالِى
لَا لَا لَا وَانَا لِسَّهْ هَقُولْهَا
لَا لَا لَا بِيِمُوتْ شُوقْ فِيَّا

english.title: I'll lve then
text: No no no what happened to me
no no no after all that he said
as soon as I saw his eyes
no  no no I never had In mind
no no no that I'll adore O nights
all the dreams he brought to me
make a wish say what you want
as I'm In the palm of his hands
as my soul Is Inside em
no no no I'll still say It
no no no the whole world
my heart,  people, say It before me
no no no I see em with my own eyes
no no no he dies for me
It's unbelievable all the tenderness that I experience with em

arabic.title: هم يبكى
text: وِدَى اخْرِةْ صُبْرِى آهْ يَانَا يَاقَلْبِى
هم يبكي وهم يضحك كُنْتِ خَلَاصْ قَرَّبْـتَ ارْتَاحْـلَكْ
وِانْتَ عَايِزْنِى أَشَارْكَكْ هَمَّكْ وَانَــا مِشْ حَمِّلْ هْــمُومْ
هَمِّ يبَكِى وُهَمِّ يضَحَّكْ إِسْكُتْ خَالِصْ سِيبْنِى اشْرَحْلِكْ
فَكِّرَاكْ جَــاىِّ تْـخَفِّـفْ عَنِّــى وَاتَــارِيـكْ قَــالْ مَـهْمُومْ
مِشْ نَاقْصَة جَرْحَ عَلَى جْرَاحِى لَا لَا لَا
وِدَى اخْرِةْ صُبْرِى آهْ يَانَا يَاقَلْبِى
بَاهْ جَاىِ يَابْنِى مَحْتَاجْ لَحُضْنِى لَا رُوحْ وِسِيبْنِى
دَه انَــا بَخْتِى مَايِـــلْ وُقَلْبِى شَايِـــلْ هُمُومْ كِتِيرِةَ
وِدَى اخْرِةْ صُبْرِى آهْ يَانَا يَاقَلْبِى

english.title: You are pathetic
text: Oh! how do this word hurt
That's what I got in the end!1 Oh, my heart.
Oh! how do this word hurt
It's better for you to go away. Go, God be with you.
You're pathetic2 . I was about to be attracted
And here you are, wanting me to share your troubles. I can't handle this.
That's pathetic. just keep quite, I will explain why
I thought I will find a relief in you. but seems that you are fed up with your troubles.
I needed a heart to become stronger.
I don't need another hurt. No, no, no
Oh! how do this word hurt
That's what I got in the end! Oh, my heart.
Oh! how do this word hurt
It's better for you to go away. Go, God be with you.
Are you coming for an embrace? No, go away
My luck is too bad4 . My heart is enduring too much worries
and I'm in no need for yours.
That's what I got in the end! Oh, my heart.

english.title: HE'S CRYING AND LAUGHING AT THE SAME TIME
text: And this Is the fruition of my patience it's either me or my heart
It's better for you to go away may God help you
He's crying and laughing at the same tone, you're like that Is
You want me to share your sorrows like I'm carefree
He's crying and laughing at the same time shut up let me explain to you
I though you came to cheer me up but you turned out to be a careworn
All my life I feel weak and I need a heart to make me stronger
I don't need another wound added to my wounds
For I already have enough on my plate
This Is the result of patience it's either me or my heart
It's better for you to go away may God help you
Oh my son you need my lap no go leave me alone
I'm down on luck and there are a lot of worries in my heart
This Is the fruition of my patience
